src:
Ini Trayek Bus yang Beroperasi di Bandara Kertajati
04 Nov 2019, 07:02 by Herdi Alif Alhikam


Foto: Istimewa/BIJB

Jakarta - Manajemen Bandara Internasional Jawa Barat (BIJB) Kertajati membantah kabar adanya shuttle bus rute Kertajati yang menutup trayek. BIJB menegaskan bahwa operator bus masih banyak yang beroperasi di BIJB.Sebelumnya, beredar kabar bahwa operator shuttle bus banyak yang gulung tikar dan menutup trayek karena rute ke Kertajati sepi penumpang."Tidak ada perusahaan antarmoda di Kertajati yang gulung tikar. Moda yang beroperasi di sini masih melakukan layanan," ungkap Corporate Secretary BIJB Arief Budiman kepada detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).Lantas, apa saja moda shuttle bus yang masih beroperasi di Kertajati?Dalam data yang dipaparkan Arief, setidaknya masih ada 12 operator bus yang membuka rute ke Kertajati. Salah satunya adalah Damri yang memberikan tiket gratis bagi penumpang menuju Bandara Kertajati, bus ini menghubungkan BIJB dengan Bandung, Cirebon, dan Kuningan.Sedangkan untuk operator bus yang lain, tarif yang dipatok masih menggunakan harga promo. Mulai dari Rp 15 ribu hingga 100 ribu tergantung jauh dekat jarak tempuhnya. Selain shuttle bus, masih ada dua taksi yang juga mondar-mandir ke Kertajati, yaitu Blue Bird dan Grab.Selain Damri, berikut ini daftar lengkap trayek bus yang masih beroperasi di Bandara Kertajati.1. CTU Shuttle, membuka rute Bandung-BIJB dan Tasikmalaya-BIJB.2. MyTrans, membuka rute Bandung-BIJB.3. ECA Shuttle, membuka rute Cirebon-BIJB, Kuningan-BIJB, dan Indramayu-BIJB.4. P. Trans, membuka rute Purwakarta-BIJB.5. Baraya, membuka rute Bandung-BIJB.6. Mekarsari, membuka rute Cikijing-BIJB, Majalengka-BIJB, dan Rajagaluh-BIJB.7. Arnes, membuka rute Jatinangor-BIJB, Sumedang-BIJB, Maja-BIJB, Tonjong-BIJB, dan Kadipaten-BIJB.8. Budiman, membuka rute Tasikmalaya-BIJB.9. Bhineka Shuttle, membuka rute Bandung-BIJB dan Cirebon-BIJB.10. Sobat Trans, membuka rute Cirebon-BIJB.11 Urban's Travel, membuka rute Tasikmalaya-BIJB dan Bandung-BIJB.12. Damri, membuka rute Bandung-BIJB, Cirebon-BIJB, dan Kuningan-BIJB.Simak Video "Lahan di Area Bandara Kertajati Terbakar"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)
text:
This is the Bus Route that operates at Kertajati Airport
Nov 04 2019, 07:02 by Herdi Alif Alhikam


Photo: Special / BIJB

Jakarta - Management of the West Java International Airport (BIJB) Kertajati has denied the news of the Kertajati shuttle bus route closing the route. BIJB confirmed that there are still many bus operators operating at BIJB. Previously, it was rumored that many shuttle bus operators had closed down and closed routes because the route to Kertajati was empty of passengers. "There are no intermodal companies in Kertajati that have closed down. Modes operating here still performing services, "said BIJB Corporate Secretary Arief Budiman to AFP on Monday (11/04/2019). Then, what are the shuttle bus modes that are still operating in Kertajati? In the data presented by Arief, there are at least 12 bus operators who open the route to Kertajati. One of them is Damri, which provides free tickets for passengers to Kertajati Airport, this bus connects BIJB with Bandung, Cirebon and Kuningan. While for other bus operators, the fare is still using the promo price. Starting from Rp 15 thousand to 100 thousand depending on the distance near the distance. In addition to the shuttle bus, there are still two taxis that go back and forth to Kertajati, namely Blue Bird and Grab. Besides Damri, the following is a complete list of bus routes that are still operating at Kertajati Airport. CTU Shuttle, opening the Bandung-BIJB and Tasikmalaya-BIJB routes.2. MyTrans, opening the Bandung-BIJB route.3. ECA Shuttle, opens the route Cirebon-BIJB, Kuningan-BIJB, and Indramayu-BIJB.4. P. Trans, opens the Purwakarta-BIJB route.5. Baraya, opening the Bandung-BIJB route.6. Mekarsari, opened the Cikijing-BIJB, Majalengka-BIJB, and Rajagaluh-BIJB routes.7. Arnes, opened the Jatinangor-BIJB, Sumedang-BIJB, Maja-BIJB, Tonjong-BIJB, and Duchy-BIJB routes.8. Budiman, opened the Tasikmalaya-BIJB route.9. Bhineka Shuttle, opening the Bandung-BIJB route and Cirebon-BIJB.10. Buddy Trans, opens the route Cirebon-BIJB.11 Urban's Travel, opens the Tasikmalaya-BIJB route and Bandung-BIJB.12. Damri, opens the Bandung-BIJB, Cirebon-BIJB, and Kuningan-BIJB routes. Watch the video "Land in the Kertajati Airport Area Burned" [Gambas: Video 20second] (zlf / zlf)
